reviewText: When Charlie's Angels came out we could get the first four seasons. We all waited for season five to come out for a long time, but what they released was the whole series box set, as if we would not ever see a season 5. Well, later they released season 5 after everyone bought the entire series. Looks like they are messing around with the Hart to Hart series as well. Why can't Sony just release seasons 3, 4 and 5. I want the 8 Hart to Hart movies but I want to see all of the original series first. And we shouldn't have to rebuy some of the Hart to Hart stuff just to get the other part we don't have, which is what happen with the Charlie's Angels DVDs. So beware people. Also the Charlie's Angels box set has all white, completely blank DVDs. No graphics on them at all. I don't know if the HH movie collections are like that or not. I would have to buy them to know. Please release seasons 3, 4 and 5. And finally, I'm not paying the stupid prices for the movies when a whole season of Hart to Hart is now less than twenty dollars.

This was a 5 star show and the movies are 5 stars too.  I have waited a long time to own them.  They are fun, interesting, funny, and really sweet!  I really hope they come out with the rest of the show seasons as well as the movies.  If they fo, sign me up!!!
I would recommend this for my family and yours tooo!

Thank goodness I bought Hart to Hart Seasons 1 AND 2 a few years ago from Half Price Books.  They might have been around $10 for each season, but I KNOW they were under $20.  And now they are $75?  I wasn't sure how to do the star rating -- definitely a 5 for the series itself, but the price is ridiculous.

To con't the review on Hart to Hart vol 2 tv movie series  Wow  reviews are pouring in for the demand of a product
Sony  75.99  on vol 1 and 2  over 150.00 dollars  who has that amount of cash!  MARKET ON DEMAND  apparently the public wants this product all of Hart to  Hart  Tv movies the series  We will buy the product however a few can only afford that price  perhaps marketing 101 should come into effect  Sony will get more money if the product is affordable to everyone's purse  Think about it Sony  Amazon help us

I don't blame Amazon for the prices of these two sets of movies (Vol 1 and Vol 2). This is a problem with the people releasing these, Sony MOD (manufacture on demand)!! Not only did Sony decide not to finish the rest of the seasons to complete this excellant series starring Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers and Lionel Stander by making them available at retail stores, now they insult the wonderful work done on this excellant tv series by making them so unaffordable that fans like myself who are on fixed incomes (like a whole lot of people out there!!) can't afford to buy them! Really a slap in the face to all us fans! Shame on SONY! RP

I love the Hart to Hart on Dish TV but could only get a few of the collection so I bought Vol 1 & 2 so that I could watch all of the collection. Love this movie collection!  Same charm and humor as in the series.  Enjoy Robert Wagner and adore the still beautiful and classy Stefanie Powers!  Perfect!

These TV movies of Hart to Hart were pretty much like the series back in the 1980's. Both Robert Wagner and Stefanie Powers were still great together and Lionel Stander who played Max was also fantastic in the series and TV movies
Loved the tv series. Had seen all the movies when they came out. It's so great to have them and watch them again. Wonderful movies. Buy them ,you will be very happy you did.

When I first received this item, all discs in the set were bad, so I had them replaced.  The second set was also bad, so I had that set replaced as well.  The third set that I just received is also bad.  Need I say more?  This time, I want a refund.

I enjoy hart to hart and I find the movies were something I missed due to busy teenage life.  I'm glad I had the opportunity to watch them now, and wish they would finish the series publication, since I believe they haven't released the 3rd, 4th, or 5th and final season.
The stories are very engaging.  Wonderful writing, filming.  It is great to see one of my favorite casts together again.  I didn't think it could get any better, but it was wonderful.

Worth It! Such a lovely collection of Hart  to Hart movies. This set includes the gut wrenching movie about the death of Max ( Lionel Sanders).  It is a lovely tribute forever to Max and his support and love for " Jonathon and Jennifer" . If you like the H2H series, Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers ...You will love this set.
